"component": "code",
"type": "javascript",
"title": "solution",
"value": "let readlineaSync = require(\"readline-sync\");
var number=readlineaSync.questionInt(\"enter a number\");
if(number%5===0 && number%15===0){
console.log(\"Divisible by both\");
}
else{
console.log(\"Not divisible by both\");
}"
}
